questions: Describe a memorable holiday you have had. You should say where you went, what you did, who you went with, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about a book that has had a significant impact on your life. You should say what the book is, what it is about, when you read it, and explain why it impacted you.
Describe a skill you would like to learn in the future. You should say what the skill is, how you would learn it, why you want to learn it, and how it would help you.
Talk about a person who has inspired you. You should say who the person is, how you know about them, what qualities they have, and explain why they inspire you.
Describe your favorite place to relax. You should say where it is, what it looks like, what you do there, and explain why it is your favorite place.
Talk about an important event in your country’s history. You should say what the event is, when it happened, what happened during the event, and explain why it is important.
Describe a piece of music or song that you like. You should say what it is, when you first heard it, why you like it, and how it makes you feel.
Talk about a hobby or activity you used to enjoy as a child. You should say what it was, how often you did it, who you did it with, and explain why you enjoyed it.
Describe a time when you helped someone. You should say who you helped, how you helped them, why you helped them, and how you felt about it.
Talk about a film or television program that you found interesting. You should say what it was about, who was in it, why you found it interesting, and what you learned from it.
Describe a festival or celebration in your country. You should say what it is, how it is celebrated, who participates, and explain why it is important.
Talk about a place you would like to visit in the future. You should say where it is, why you want to visit it, what you would do there, and explain how it would be special for you.
Describe a memorable meal you have had. You should say where you had it, what food you ate, who you were with, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about a teacher who has influenced you. You should say who this teacher was, what subject they taught, how they influenced you, and explain why they had an impact on your life.
Describe an object that is important to you. You should say what it is, how you got it, what you use it for, and explain why it is important to you.
Talk about a time when you faced a challenge. You should say what the challenge was, how you dealt with it, what happened in the end, and explain what you learned from the experience.
Describe a sport or physical activity you enjoy. You should say what it is, how often you do it, who you do it with, and explain why you enjoy it.
Talk about a recent technology that has made life easier. You should say what it is, how you use it, how it helps you, and explain why it is useful.
Describe a place in your hometown that is popular with visitors. You should say where it is, what it looks like, what activities people do there, and explain why it attracts visitors.
Talk about a skill that is useful in your daily life. You should say what the skill is, how you learned it, how often you use it, and explain why it is helpful.
Describe a time when you received good news. You should say what the news was, how you received it, who you shared it with, and explain how it affected you.
Talk about a traditional dish from your country. You should say what it is, how it is prepared, when it is usually eaten, and explain why it is special to you.
Describe a building or place that has historical significance. You should say where it is, what it looks like, what happened there, and explain why it is important.

Talk about an experience when you learned something new outside of school. You should say what you learned, how you learned it, why you wanted to learn it, and explain what you gained from the experience.

Describe a city you have visited that is famous for its cultural heritage. You should say where it is, what cultural sites you visited, what you learned, and explain why it was interesting.
Talk about a memorable challenge you have overcome in your life. You should say what the challenge was, how you handled it, what the outcome was, and explain what you learned from it.
Describe a time when you tried a new hobby or activity. You should say what it was, how you got interested, what you did, and explain how you felt about the experience.
Talk about an environmental place or park that you would like to visit. You should say where it is, what you know about it, what activities you would do there, and explain why it interests you.
Describe a memorable conversation you had with someone you did not know well. You should say who the person was, what you talked about, where it happened, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about a tradition or custom from another country that you find fascinating. You should say what the tradition is, where it is from, how it is practiced, and explain why you find it interesting.
Describe an important technological device or app that has impacted your daily life. You should say what it is, how you use it, how it has changed your habits, and explain why it is important to you.
Talk about a person you admire for their achievements in sports or arts. You should say who this person is, what they have achieved, how they inspire you, and explain why you admire them.
Describe a place where you like to spend time with your family or friends. You should say where it is, what you do there, who you go with, and explain why you enjoy spending time there.

Talk about a situation when you had to work with a group of people to complete a task. You should say what the task was, who was involved, what role you played, and explain how successful the experience was.
Describe a time when you received unexpected help. You should say who helped you, what the situation was, how they helped, and explain how it affected you.
Talk about a favorite childhood toy. You should say what it was, who gave it to you, how you played with it, and explain why it was special to you.
Describe an interesting cultural festival you would like to attend. You should say what the festival is, where it is celebrated, what activities happen, and explain why you want to attend.
Talk about a natural place in your country that you enjoy visiting. You should say where it is, what natural features it has, what you do there, and explain why you enjoy it.
Describe an achievement in your life you are proud of. You should say what the achievement is, how you accomplished it, which difficulties you overcame, and explain why it is important to you.
Talk about a person who has taught you an important life lesson. You should say who this person is, what lesson they taught you, how they taught it, and explain why it was significant.
Describe a city or town that you find charming. You should say where it is, what makes it charming, what you like about it, and explain why others might enjoy visiting.
Talk about a time when you had to adapt to a new environment. You should say what the environment was, how you adapted, what challenges you faced, and explain what you learned from the experience.
Describe a hobby that has improved your mental well-being. You should say what the hobby is, how you started it, what benefits it brings, and explain why it helps you.
Talk about a meal that reminds you of your family or home. You should say what the meal is, who usually prepares it, when you eat it, and explain why it is special for you.
Describe a time when you experienced a cultural festival abroad. You should say where it was, what the festival involved, who you went with, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about a place you visited that is known for its natural beauty. You should say where it is, what you saw, what activities you did there, and explain why it was special.
Describe a recent technological innovation you are excited about. You should say what it is, how it works, how you learned about it, and explain why it interests you.
Talk about a memorable lesson you learned from a family member. You should say who taught you, what the lesson was, how they taught it, and explain why it was important.
Describe an unusual job you find interesting. You should say what the job is, what people do in this job, why it interests you, and explain if you would like to try it.

Talk about a time when you participated in a community cleanup or environmental protection activity. You should say what the activity was, where it took place, what you did, and explain how it affected you.
Describe a city or town that has changed significantly in recent years. You should say where it is, what changes have happened, how people feel about these changes, and explain your opinion.
Talk about a special event or ceremony in your culture that you have attended. You should say what the event was, where and when it took place, what happened, and explain why it was unique.
Describe a memorable experience of helping someone in need. You should say who the person was, how you helped them, why you decided to help, and explain how you felt afterward.
Talk about a book or film that changed your perspective on an important issue. You should say what it was, what issues it addressed, how it affected your thinking, and explain why it was impactful.
Describe a community event you have attended. You should say what the event was, where it took place, what activities were involved, and explain why it was enjoyable.
Talk about a favorite piece of art you have seen. You should say what the artwork is, where you saw it, what it represents, and explain why you like it.

Describe a time when you learned a new language or improved your language skills. You should say which language it was, why you wanted to learn it, how you practiced, and explain how it benefited you.
Talk about an outdoor place where you like to spend time. You should say where it is, what you do there, who you go with, and explain why you enjoy it.
Describe an important environmental issue in your area. You should say what the issue is, what causes it, how it affects people or nature, and explain how it can be solved.
Talk about a time when you had to plan a special event. You should say what the event was, how you planned it, who was involved, and explain how it went.
Describe a meal you cooked for someone special. You should say what the meal was, how you prepared it, who you cooked it for, and explain why it was meaningful.
Talk about a place connected to your family history. You should say where the place is, what its significance is, what memories are associated with it, and explain why it is important to you.
Describe a magazine or newspaper article that influenced your thinking. You should say what the article was about, where you read it, what it said, and explain how it affected you.
Talk about a hobby that helps you stay physically or mentally active. You should say what the hobby is, how often you do it, what benefits it brings you, and explain why you find it important.
Describe a place you have visited that has unique wildlife. You should say where it is, what kinds of animals live there, what you saw, and explain why the wildlife was interesting to you.
Talk about a traditional musical instrument from your country. You should say what the instrument is, how it is played, in what situations it is used, and explain why it is significant culturally.
Describe a teacher or mentor outside of formal education who influenced you. You should say who they are, how you met them, what you learned from them, and explain why they had an impact on you.
Talk about a market or shopping area you like to visit. You should say where it is, what you can buy there, what the atmosphere is like, and explain why you enjoy going there.
Describe a hobby or pastime that helps you relieve stress. You should say what the hobby is, how you do it, when you started, and explain why it helps you relax.
Talk about an important piece of advice you received. You should say who gave it to you, what the advice was, when you received it, and explain how it affected your life.
Describe a place in your country that is popular among tourists. You should say where it is, what can be seen or done there, who goes there, and explain why it is popular.
Talk about a memorable experience you had in nature. You should say where it was, what happened, who you were with, and explain why it was memorable.
Describe a job or profession you think is important. You should say what the job is, what the person does, why it is important, and explain if you would like to do this job.

Talk about a cultural festival celebrated in your country that is less known internationally. You should say what the festival is about, how people celebrate it, who participates, and explain why it is important to you.
Describe a recent celebration or ceremony you attended. You should say what the occasion was, where it took place, what activities were involved, and explain why it was special to you.
Talk about a time when you witnessed an act of kindness. You should say where and when it happened, who was involved, what happened, and explain how it affected you.

Describe an interesting experience you had with public transportation. You should say what kind of transport it was, where you were going, what happened during the trip, and explain what you learned from the experience.

Talk about a cultural event or tradition from another country that you find fascinating. You should say what the event is, where it is celebrated, what happens during the event, and explain why it interests you.
Describe a memorable experience related to learning a new language. You should say which language it was, how you learned it, what challenges you faced, and explain how it has benefited you.
Talk about a public place in your city that you enjoy visiting. You should say where it is, what you do there, who you go with, and explain why it is enjoyable for you.
Describe an invention that you think will be common in the future. You should say what the invention is, how it works, why you think it will be common, and explain how it could impact people's lives.
Talk about a time when you had to make a difficult decision. You should say what the decision was, why it was difficult, how you made the choice, and explain what the result was.
Describe a favorite outdoor activity you enjoy doing. You should say what the activity is, where and how often you do it, who you do it with, and explain why you enjoy it.
Talk about a historical figure you admire. You should say who the person is, what they are known for, why you admire them, and explain how they have influenced history.
Describe a memorable gift you received from a friend. You should say what the gift was, when you received it, why it was special, and explain how it made you feel.
Talk about a person you met during travel who left an impression on you. You should say who they were, how you met them, what you talked about, and explain why they were memorable.
Describe a place in your city where you like to spend time in nature. You should say where it is, what activities you do there, who you go with, and explain why you enjoy it.
Talk about an experience when you tried a traditional craft or art form. You should say what it was, how you tried it, what you learned, and explain whether you would like to do it again.
Describe a time when you taught someone a new skill. You should say what the skill was, who you taught, how you taught them, and explain how it felt to help someone.
Talk about a historical event related to your family or ancestors. You should say what the event was, when it happened, how it affected your family, and explain why it is important to you.
Describe a technology or app that you frequently use for learning. You should say what it is, how you use it, what benefits it provides, and explain why it is useful for education.

Talk about an unusual animal or pet you have seen or would like to have. You should say what the animal is, where you saw it or why you'd like it, how it behaves, and explain what interests you about it.
Describe a place where people gather to celebrate sports or cultural events in your area. You should say where it is, what events are held there, who visits, and explain why it is popular.
Talk about a book character or fictional person you admire. You should say who the character is, what story they are from, what qualities they have, and explain why you admire them.
Describe a historical monument or site you have visited. You should say where it is located, what its history is, what you saw there, and explain why it was interesting to you.
Talk about an experience you had at a local market. You should say where the market was, what you bought or saw there, who you were with, and explain what you liked about the experience.

Describe a time when you participated in a sports competition. You should say what the competition was, how you prepared for it, what happened during the competition, and explain how you felt afterwards.
Talk about a place where you like to watch the stars at night. You should say where the place is, what you see there, who you go with, and explain why you enjoy it.
Describe a film that taught you an important lesson. You should say what the film was about, what lesson it taught, when you saw it, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about a new restaurant or café that you have tried recently. You should say where it is, what kind of food they offer, who you went with, and explain whether you would recommend it.
Describe an activity you do to stay healthy. You should say what the activity is, how often you do it, how it benefits your health, and explain why it is important to you.
Talk about a natural place in your area that is good for relaxation. You should say where it is, what it looks like, what activities can be done there, and explain why it helps people relax.
Describe a book that you read because someone recommended it to you. You should say what the book is, who recommended it, what it is about, and explain whether you enjoyed it or not.

Talk about a time when you had to use your imagination to solve a problem. You should say what the problem was, how you solved it using imagination, what happened in the end, and explain how this experience affected you.
Describe a memorable experience you had while learning something new. You should say what it was, how you learned it, who helped you, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about an outdoor place in your city that you enjoy visiting. You should say where it is, what activities you do there, who you go with, and explain why you like it.
Describe a time when you received unexpected recognition or praise. You should say when it happened, what you were recognized for, who recognized you, and explain how it affected you.

Talk about a traditional custom or ritual from your culture that you find interesting. You should say what the custom is, how it is practiced, who participates in it, and explain why you find it interesting.
Describe a piece of technology that has changed the way people communicate. You should say what it is, how it works, when it became popular, and explain its impact on communication.
Talk about a public place that is popular for social gatherings in your area. You should say where it is, what people do there, what kind of events are held, and explain why it is popular.
Describe an environmental issue that concerns you in your country. You should say what the issue is, its causes, the effects on people or nature, and explain possible solutions.
Talk about a person who has made a positive impact in your community. You should say who they are, what they have done, how they have helped others, and explain why you admire them.

Describe a cultural festival that is celebrated in your country but not widely known internationally. You should say what the festival is, how it is celebrated, who participates, and explain why it is significant.

Talk about a time when you had to make an important decision related to your education or career. You should say what the decision was, how you made it, what the outcome was, and explain how it influenced your life.
Describe a memorable outdoor adventure you experienced. You should say where it took place, what activities you did, who you were with, and explain why it was memorable.
Talk about a piece of advice you gave to someone that was well received. You should say who you gave the advice to, what the advice was, when you gave it, and explain why it was effective.
Describe a unique cultural practice or custom you have learned about. You should say what it is, where it is from, how it is practiced, and explain why you find it interesting.
Talk about a person in your community who has made a difference. You should say who they are, what they have done, how they helped others, and explain why you admire them.

Describe a technological device that you think will be important in the future. You should say what the device is, how it works, why it will be important, and explain how it could impact people’s lives.

Talk about an interesting job or profession you would like to learn more about. You should say what it is, what people do in this job, why you find it interesting, and explain whether you would like to pursue it.
Describe an educational experience outside of school that influenced you. You should say what it was, how you participated, what you learned, and explain why it had an impact.
Talk about a place where people often go to relax in your country. You should say where it is, what the place looks like, what people do there, and explain why it is popular.
Describe a meal or dish that represents your culture. You should say what it is, how it is prepared, when it is usually eaten, and explain why it is representative of your culture.
Talk about a time when you had to adjust to a new environment. You should say what the environment was, how you adapted, what challenges you faced, and explain what you learned from the experience.
